title: Labor secretary Perez praises unions, criticizes Hogan, in address to teachers
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: Breaking - Today 
U.S. Labor Secretary Thomas Perez gave a full-throated defense of unions as the bedrock of the middle class on Friday, and also called out M...
